In a world teetering on the brink of a technological Dark Age, humanity faced unprecedented threats from cyber-terrorism, digital espionage, and AI-controlled warfare that could plunge civilization back into chaos.

Amidst this crisis, the Aspis Protocol, a cutting-edge blockchain platform known for its secure, decentralized vaults and AI-governed trading strategies, discovered an ancient artifact during a routine digital excavation of historical blockchain data.

This artifact, a digital relic embedded with mysterious code, triggered a time anomaly, pulling the ancient Greek army into the future. Led by their kings and structured into formidable ranks from basic Hoplites to the elite Hippeis, these warriors found themselves in a vastly changed world, governed by technology they could hardly fathom.
